name: Miracle
description: You touch a creature and attempt to bless them with a miracle. Roll a 1d12; on a 6 or higher, you remove any non-permanent condition from them. On a 12, the target of this spell regains all of their health and all non-permanent conditions are removed. A creature can only be the target of a miracle once per day.
charge: When you roll an 8 or higher when performing a miracle, you can remove a single permanent condition as well.
